stories.text:
*Yet Another Gmail Workspaces Alternatives Post

I know alternatives to Google Workspaces have been discussed to death recently. And, after looking at a few of the options mentioned in other threads, I'm leaning towards inbox.eu. They seem to offer the most competitive price for the modest needs I have [Custom domain. Handful of addresses for family members. Not bothered about any of the usual 'businessy' stuff].

Searching HN, I only find user 'malinens' with much to say about inbox.eu and s/he seems to be involved with the company, so likely not entirely unbiased. Searching further afield, 'malinens' shows up again in most of the positive mentions of inbox.eu I find online. And all the negative reviews seem to be the same one copy/pasted to everywhere inbox.eu is mentioned and presumably by another single individual.

So, between those two extremes, it would be nice to find some unbiased opinions from people without a personal axe to grind. So, as the title says; Anyone Using inbox.eu? And, if so, how are you finding it? Also, how much hassle was importing your mail from Google?
stories.title: YAGWAP* – Anyone Using Inbox.eu? Good, Bad or Indifferent?
